column1: '''Adventures in Unnatural History and Medieval Metres, being the Freaks of Fisiologus''' is a poem written by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and published in June [[1927]] within ''The Stapeldon Magazine'' Vol. 7 No. 40 on pages 123-127. Tolkien used the pen name [[Fisiologus]]. The poem was reprinted in a revised form as '[[Fastitocalon (poem)
column2: Fastitocalon]]' within ''[[The Adventures of Tom Bombadil]]''.
